body_html: I did not find any way to get model's .pbtxt file only from .py file. If we do not have .pbtxt, these pre-trained .ckpt can do nothing. We can't use .ckpt file for prediction or feature extraction.

body: I did not find any way to get model's .pbtxt file only from .py file. If we do not have .pbtxt, these pre-trained .ckpt can do nothing. We can't use .ckpt file for prediction or feature extraction.
